content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position (43.0, -82.0) and a Chest at position (42.5, -83.5) to store the mined coal.

### Coal Transportation System
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) that picks up coal from the Chest at position (43.5, -81.5) and drops it into the Chest at position (43.5, -79.5).

### Coal Storage at position (42.5, -83.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (42.5, -83.5) that stores coal.

### Coal Storage at position (44.5, -81.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (44.5, -81.5) that stores coal.

### Coal Storage at position (45.5, -80.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (45.5, -80.5) that is empty.

### Coal Storage at position (43.5, -79.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (43.5, -79.5) that stores coal and is currently full.

### Stone Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0) that is currently out of ingredients.

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items.
- Make sure to check the chest's inventory before extracting items.

### Errors when mining with a Burner Mining Drill
- Ensure the drill has enough fuel to continue mining.
- Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full before continuing to mine.

### Errors when using a Burner Inserter
- Ensure the inserter has enough fuel to continue operating.
- Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full before continuing to insert items.
